overview: "Terre Emerse" is an investigation above the sea level. "Terre Emerse" is a road-trip in which Antonio Angelucci, architect and researcher, is looking for whom reside besides water and rivers in peripheral areas between Veneto and Friuli Venezia Giulia. Those areas, reclaimed first from the sea and then from the swamp at the beginning of XIX century, are today particularly subjected to river floods and sea storm.
title: Emerged Lands
